TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Grid extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild
Public Class Grid Inherits Panel Implements IAddChild
public ref class Grid : System::Windows::Controls::Panel, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild
type Grid = class inherit Panel interface IAddChild

summary.span: 定义由列和行组成的灵活的网格区域。

span.span: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 对象的集合，这些对象在 属性中。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 在 中定义的列和行可以利用 调整大小来按比例分配剩余空间。Columns and rows that are defined within a can take advantage of sizing to distribute remaining space proportionally. 如果选择 作为行或列的高度或宽度，则该列或行会获得剩余可用空间的加权比例。When is selected as the height or width of a row or column, that column or row receives a weighted proportion of the remaining available space. 这与 相反，后者基于列或行中内容的大小均匀地分布空间。This is in contrast to , which distributes space evenly based on the size of the content that is within a column or row. 使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 时，此值表示为 `*` 或 `2*`。This value is expressed as `*` or `2*` when you use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 在第一种情况下，行或列将接收一次可用空间，而在第二种情况下，行或列将接收两次可用空间，依此类推。In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space, while in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on. 通过将此方法与 `Stretch`的 和 值组合在一起可以按比例分配空间，可以按屏幕空间百分比分区布局空间。By combining this technique to proportionally distribute space with a and value of `Stretch`, it is possible to partition layout space by percentage of screen space. 是唯一可以采用这种方式分布空间的布局面板。 is the only layout panel that can distribute space in this manner. 默认情况下，行和列占用的空间量最少，以容纳给定行或列中包含的任何单元内的最大内容。By default, rows and columns take up the least amount of space necessary to accommodate the largest content within any cell contained in a given row or column. 例如，如果某列具有一个包含长词（如 "hippopotamus"）的单元格，但列中的所有其他单元格都具有更小的词（如 "dog"），则该列的宽度将是最大单词（hippopotamus）的宽度。For example, if a column has one cell with a long word like "hippopotamus" contained within it but all the other cells in the column have smaller words like "dog", the width of the column will be the width of the largest word (hippopotamus). 您可以通过组合使用 属性和对齐属性，精确定位 的子元素。You can precisely position child elements of a by using a combination of the property and alignment properties. 的子元素按它们在标记或代码中出现的顺序进行绘制。Child elements of a are drawn in the order in which they appear in markup or code. 因此，当元素共享相同的坐标时，可以实现分层顺序（也称为 z 顺序）。As a consequence, layered order (also known as z-order) can be achieved when elements share the same coordinates. 和 共享某些常见功能，但每个功能都可以在适当的方案中应用，以便更好地使用其内置功能。 and share some common functionality, but each can be applied in appropriate scenarios to better use its built-in features. 基于行和列索引添加元素; 不存在。 adds elements based on a row and column index; does not. 元素允许内容分层，其中有多个元素可以存在于单个单元中。The element allows layering of content, where more than one element can exist within a single cell. 不支持分层。 does not support layering. 的子元素可相对于其 "单元格" 边界的左上角进行绝对定位。Child elements of a can be absolutely positioned relative to the upper-left corner of their "cell" boundaries. 不支持此功能。 does not support this feature. 还提供比 更灵活的大小调整行为。 also offers more flexible resizing behavior than . 使用 对象来定义 或 的大小调整特性。 uses the object to define the sizing characteristics of a or . 有关每个单位类型的定义，请参阅 。For a definition of each unit type, see . 如果将子元素添加到 中的列，并且该列的 属性设置为 `Auto`，则将测量子元素而不会受到任何限制。If a child element is added to a column within a , and the column has its property set to `Auto`, the child will be measured without restrictions. 如果正在使用 ，此行为可能会阻止水平滚动条显示，因为子元素被视为未绑定。This behavior can prevent horizontal scroll bars from displaying if a is being used, as the child element is measured as unbounded. 出于显示目的，将剪裁子元素，而不是滚动。For purposes of display, the child is clipped rather than scrolled. 默认情况下，Panel 元素不接收焦点。Panel elements do not receive focus by default. 若要强制 panel 元素接收焦点，请将 属性设置为 `true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建网格。The following example demonstrates how to create a grid. 在这种情况下，网格定义了三个 元素和四个承载子内容的 元素。In this case, the grid defines three elements and four elements that host child content. [!code-csharp[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/CSharp/Grid_Code.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/VisualBasic/grid_vb.vb#3)] [!code-xaml[Grid#3](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Grid/XAML/default.xaml#3)]

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that multiple elements are sharing size information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参与大小共享的列和行不会考虑 大小调整。Columns and rows participating in size sharing do not respect sizing. 在此方案中， 大小调整视为 。In this scenario, sizing is treated as . 如果在资源模板中将 设置为 `true`，并且在该模板外部定义 ，则网格大小共享不起作用。Grid size sharing does not work if is set to `true` within a resource template, and a is defined outside of that template. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 和代码中的 属性。The following code examples demonstrate how to use the property in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] and code. [!code-xml[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] ...... [!code-xml[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml#2)] ...... 使用代码处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中定义的事件。Events defined in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] are handled using code. [!code-csharp[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[gridIssharedsizescopeProp#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/gridIssharedsizescopeProp/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用网格线会围绕 中的所有元素创建虚线。Enabling grid lines creates dotted lines around all the elements within a . 只有虚线可用，因为此属性旨在用作调试布局问题的设计工具，不应在生产质量代码中使用。Only dotted lines are available because this property is intended as a design tool to debug layout problems and is not intended for use in production quality code. 如果需要 中的行，请设置 中的元素样式，使其具有边框。If you want lines inside a , style the elements within the to have borders. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

that represents the total number of child objects.
The default value is zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用此方法期间，不能修改可视化树。The visual tree must not be modified during a call to this method.
